code: @Test public void testLiteralMapping() throws Exception {     resultEndpoint.expectedMessageCount(1).     ABCOrder abcOrder = new ABCOrder().     abcOrder.setHeader(new Header()).     abcOrder.getHeader().setStatus("GOLD").     startEndpoint.sendBody(abcOrder).     // check results     resultEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied().     XYZOrder result = resultEndpoint.getExchanges().get(0).getIn().getBody(XYZOrder.class).     Assert.assertEquals(result.getPriority(), "GOLD").     Assert.assertEquals("ACME-SALES", result.getCustId()).     Assert.assertEquals("W123-EG", result.getOrderId()). }
